attributes.additional_details:
Martin Dickiinson should receive an honour for his efforts in organising one of the biggest Charity Motorbike rides in this country in support of the NATIONAL Memorial Arboretum at Alrewas, Staffordshire.
He started this event as a way of helping the NMA raise funds, and has turned it into a pilgrimage for bikes around the country to pay their respects to the Forces Fallen.
